title: Citroen to scale up sales network in India to over 200 outlets by this year end
description: French automaker Citroen plans to expand its sales network in India to over 200 outlets by the end of the year, a significant increase from its current 58 touchpoints. This expansion will cover urban, semi-urban, and rural markets, aiming to provide a diverse and expansive customer base with an unparalleled Citroen brand experience.
